thread.title: Canonical Releases Important Security Patches for Ubuntu 15.04 and 14.04 LTS
thread.title_full: Canonical Releases Important Security Patches for Ubuntu 15.04 and 14.04 LTS - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Canonical Releases Important Security Patches for Ubuntu 15.04 and 14.04 LTS
text: After announcing the general availability of a new kernel version of its Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (Precise Pangolin) operating system, Canonical published details about an important security patch for the kernel packages of Ubuntu 15.04 and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. Four vulnerabilities have been patched in the Linux 3.19 and Linux 3.13 kernel pa... Â»
